meanings.definition: A flowering plant that produces seeds enclosed within a carpel.
meanings.sent1: The angiosperm bloomed beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I learned about angiosperms in my science class.
meanings.sent3: Why did the angiosperm go to the plant party? To show off its petals!
meanings.sent4: The angiosperm stood out among the greenery like a colorful jewel.
meanings.sent5: The delicate angiosperm swayed in the breeze, attracting bees with its sweet nectar.

meanings.definition: A plant that reproduces via flowers and seeds enclosed within a fruit.
meanings.sent1: The angiosperm tree bore delicious fruits every summer.
meanings.sent2: Farmers rely on angiosperms for their crop production.
meanings.sent3: Why did the angiosperm bring a suitcase to the orchard? It was going on a seed-cation!
meanings.sent4: The angiosperm's fruits were like little treasure chests waiting to be opened.
meanings.sent5: The ripe angiosperm fruit glistened in the sunlight, tempting hungry animals nearby.
